thread.title: Mike Evans roams Texas A&M sidelines wearing a Johnny Manziel Browns jersey
thread.title_full: Mike Evans roams Texas A&M sidelines wearing a Johnny Manziel Browns jersey

author: Sid Saraf
title: Mike Evans roams Texas A&M sidelines wearing a Johnny Manziel Browns jersey
text:
Mike Evans roams Texas A&M sidelines wearing a Johnny Manziel Browns jersey FOXSports 1 hr ago Sid Saraf © Getty Images HOUSTON, TX - SEPTEMBER 27: Mike Evans #13 of the Tampa Bay Buccaneers in pre-game warm up before playing against the Houston Texans on September 27, 2015 at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas. (Photo by Thomas B. Shea/Getty Images) Mike Evans clearly loves Johnny Manziel.
It makes sense, since the two starred at Texas A&M during their college days. But those days are over. Manziel is currently the backup quarterback for the Cleveland Browns, while Evans is a second-year wide receiver for the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
AdChoices But that doesn't mean Evans won't support his friend whenever he gets the chance. He showed up in College Station, Texas on Saturday for Texas A&M's game against Alabama.
And he was wearing a Manziel jersey.
There's Mike Evans in his Manziel jersey. #12thMan pic.twitter.com/ewdiZ8jt25
— Colin Deaver (@KAGS_Colin) October 17, 2015 Notice something? Yeah, that's a Browns jersey. Is it a big deal? Maybe not for most people, but some Buccaneers fans might have a problem with it.
But Evans is thinking about his friend first. A friend who was back in the news on Friday when it was revealed that he had been pulled over by the police earlier in the week.
